cont.entity_a: Tack sharp with brilliant color. Super-sharp with built-in camera stabilization for low light use. Very sharp from f1.8, with top-notch image quality. Outstanding bokeh and sharpness. Superior to other Sony lenses in brightness and sharpness.
cont.entity_b: Not as sharp at 28mm, better at 50mm-80mm. Soft at f/3.5 and f/18+, best at f/11.

cont.entity_a: Brilliant color. Typical Zeiss colors and microcontrast.
Gorgeous bokeh. Produces breathtaking results with creamy bokeh. Outstanding bokeh and sharpness.
Heavy and not suitable as a walk-around lens. Heavy, best used with a tripod.

cont.entity_b: Plastic build but looks good on the camera.
Fast autofocus. AF is a bit slow.

cont.entity_a: High price tag, but worth the investment.
cont.entity_b: Great value for the price. Excellent price point.

cont.entity_a: Ideal for portrait work and astrophotography.
cont.entity_b: Not a professional lens but perfect for everyday amateur use. Great all-purpose lens for general use.

cont.entity_a: Superior to other Sony lenses in brightness and sharpness. Considered the best lens Sony makes.

cont.entity_b: Nice focal range of 28-80mm, suitable for portraits and landscapes.

cont.entity_a: Ideal for portrait work and astrophotography.
